attributes.action: Raise the apprentice minimum wage to normal minimum wage - equal job, equal pay?
attributes.additional_details:
Information about apprenticeship wages:

https://www.gov.uk/apprenticeships-guide/pay-and-conditions

Apprentice rights and responsibilities:

https://www.ucas.com/alternatives/apprenticeships/apprenticeships-england/apprentices-rights-and-responsibilities
attributes.background:
I believe that £3.70 an hour is an unfair wage packet for someone who has the same responsibilities as a regular employee, but with an apprenticeship title.
If anything, an apprenticeship has more responsibilities than a regular employee!
